## DateApiObject.updateOriginal() method

Updates originalValue, if value is not provided originalValue is set to value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateOriginal(value?: TDate): DateApiObject<TDate>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | TDate | Value to be set as original, or null (value will be used as value) |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DateApiObject](./datetime.dateapiobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt;

Itself for fluent API
